Dialogue.Value: Huff.... Huff...,The pedometer in my PET,is quite nice to have!
When I couldn’t read my,email，I’d often forget,important documents.
Thanks to the Internet and,your NetNavi，you can easily,access any electronic device!
Isn’t that great?
Hm，so 30 chips go in the,folder，and....
Today’s job is to get rid of,the viruses that infected a,customer’s machine.
Let’s be sure to do a good job,and get them all!
The middle school is straight,ahead!
Ehehe! I’ve been trying,really hard to memorize,the town map!
My friend’s fridge broke down,yesterday.
I wonder if that net crime group,ROM is involved.
If you’re ever in trouble or,forget your schedule，just,press the L Button!
Your Navi will give you advice.
I’m quite forgetful，so I rely on,my Navi quite often.
This is Genso Town.
We’re far enough away from,urban centers to still have,clean air here.
This really is a nice place to,live.
Genso Middle School is right,through this gate.
My grandson goes here，,so I came to see it.
Don’t you go to school here,too，young lady?
Hey，big sis!,I have a Navi in my cellphone!
Now I can use it like a,handheld game console!
Hey，do you know about,jacking in?
You can jack in and send,your Navi into a computer!
It’s easy! Just press R near,the computer!
It looks like you can jack into,this flower，so give it a try!
Hey，isn’t this flowery house,yours?
I sell Sub Chips.
Would you like to,buy some Sub Chips?
I’m going to ride the metro to,Central City to go shopping!
I’m waiting for my friends，,but they’re not here yet!
The Linear Metro is a,high-speed underground train.
Since there’s no weather,underground，delays are,pretty rare.
I see this mansion every day，,but I’m always surprised by,how large it is.
I wanted to be rich enough to,live in a mansion like this....
You can get to Genso,University quickly by riding,the metro.
Thanks to the metro，it’s,easy to get to campus from,my parents’ house.
I heard they’re gonna release,some easy-to-use tools that let,you power up your Navi!
Seriously!? My Navi’s buster,can be that strong!?
Wha!?,A tank!?
Doesn’t look like it’s one of,Rika’s....
Sorry to startle ya，but could,ya help me out?
What’s wrong?
Seems like a virus got into,the control unit!,The hatch won’t open!
If ya got a strong Navi，mind,doin’ some virus bustin’ for,me?
Sure thing，if there’s a reward!
Hey! You shouldn’t ask for,rewards!
If she wants to give us a,reward，who are we as,NetBattlers to stop her?
Save it for later!,It’s gettin’ hot in here!
Um....,Where’s the jack in port....?
Ah，there it is!,You’re up，Shanghai!
Battle Routine! Set!
That was surprisingly tough....
Ah，it’s openin’!,Up we go!
Phew!,Nothin’ like fresh air〜!
Thanks for savin’ me，blondie!
You’re welcome!
So what’s a tank doing in the,middle of a small Japanese,town?
It was my favorite ride back,in Arabstan.
Oh yeah，I forgot to introduce,myself!
I’m Kumami Koa!,Nice to meetcha!
Koa，huh?,Isn’t that....?
Alice，what happened?
This woman was stuck in the,tank，so I helped her out.
Hm?,That voice....
Well if it ain’t Kumako!,I haven’t seen ya in ages!
When did you come back to,Japan? I was really worried,about you.
....Ah，now I get it.
Get what?
I asked a servant a while ago,to look into a person named,Kumami.
She’s called the ”rich,adventurer”. Sounds like,she’s kinda famous.
She’s been winning a bunch,of prize money in Arabstan,recently.
....and that’s why I think I’ll live,in this town for a while.
Oh yeah! Blondie!,About your reward....
I’ll get bored if I just sit around,doin’ nothin’，so I think I’ll open,some kinda store.
What kinda store would ya,like? Your choice，blondie!
Really!? Are you sure!?
It’s my thanks for earlier.,Just tell me whatever ya want!
Um.... Well....
Hey! Heeeeeey!,A chip shop would be nice!
A chip shop....?,Great idea!
Hold on! Let’s not get ahead,of ourselves!
Okay then，Alice. What kind,of shop would you like?
....A hobby shop.
Those kinds of shops are,everywhere!
And the closest chip shop is,all the way in Central City!
Ah....,You make a good point.
Hahaha!,You two are pretty close!
You got it! I’ll get started right,away on openin’ a chip shop!
See ya，Kumako!,I’ll treat ya to dinner next time!
Sorry about my weird sister.
So Kumami is your big sister?
That’s right.,She’s four years older than me.
She used to work for a large,bank，but she was fired for,embezzling money.
Then she turned a big profit,trading stocks and used some,of that money to see the world.
I was worried about her this,whole time.
She’s not a good sister.
Well，I hope living here will,calm her down.
By the way，Alice，it looked,like you were on your way,home.
Oh yeah! I have to get a,student metro pass!
See you later，Ms. Koa!
Be safe!
Playing around is fine，but,you shouldn’t play around,too much!
Man，you’re late.,I was gettin’ tired of waitin’.
Things got pretty exciting while,you were gone! They did!
Hm?,Remilia，why are you here?
Hohoho! Because my,intellectual curiosity is a,never-ending journey!
She decided to invite herself.,Kinda selfish if ya ask me.
I don’t mind! Having more,people is fun! It is!
That’s enough chitchat.,Let’s get going.
Sounds good!,Let’s go!
Turns out we couldn’t ask,Dr. Morichika about the results,of the data analysis.
I think we made some good,progress，at least.
Oh，a phone call.,It’s from that tank driver.
Kumami’s calling?
Hello?,How’s it going，Kumami?
Yo，blondie!,Thanks for helpin’ me out,earlier!
Sorry for such short notice，,but can I ask ya for a favor?
Sure. What is it?
I’m at the government office,right now tryin’ to get a license,for openin’ the chip shop.
But it’s lookin’ like I need a,Navi to finish the process.
Hm? You don’t have a Navi?
I do，but I forgot I lent ’er to,Kumako when I went overseas.
If ya don’t mind，could ya tell,Kumako to return ’er to me?
Ms. Koa，right?
That should be fine，but....,How am I supposed to send,her to you?
She’s a light Navi，like a,bean sprout!,Just attach her to an email!
(Bean sprout....?)
(She must be a pretty, low-capacity Navi....)
Just wanted to ask ya as,soon as I could!,I’ll have to thank ya later!
Got it.
Ms. Koa should still be at,school right now.
Then let’s try the school first!
Alice，you’ve got mail.
From Remilia?,I wonder what she has,to say....
Sorry about before.,It’s hard for me to be,honest in person.
Sakuya even scolded,me about it afterwards.
Looking back，I’ve done,some awful things.,I’ll reflect on my actions.
It’s not the most refined,apology，but I’ll give you,my P-Code.
If you’d like to play，please,come over to my house.
We simply must NetBattle,again! Sakuya is looking,forward to it too.
Well then，see you later.
So did I do well with that girl,or what?
Why do you sound so full,of yourself....?
Looks like my little pep talk,was pretty effective!
And you let it go to your head，,as always....
Well，I’m getting tired.,Should we go home?
Same here!,Let’s go home!
So you’re the one who,took my request?,Nice to meet you.
I want you to deliver this,DataPack to Genso Square.
It’s really just some Sub Chip,data for business use.
I actually wanted to take care,of this myself，but something,just came up.
You’ll get your reward from,the recipient，so please get,the data to him.
Take the data to,Genso Square!,I’m counting on you!
Whew! You saved me!,Thank you!
I bought a new AddOn at the,chip shop，and now my Navi,is super strong!
The only chip shop was in,Central City，but now we,have one here.
Wha!?,You were the one who,suggested it!? Cool!
Awww!,I don’t have a big enough,allowance to go shopping!
It’s Kumami’s favorite tank.
After its weapons were,removed，it became an,attraction for the chip shop.
It looks different than a,normal tank. Was it,remodeled in Arabstan?
I can jack into the hatch,control unit.
I’m gonna be in the,N1 League too!
I’m aiming to win!
Seems like young folks these,days are obsessed with the,Internet.
I don’t need things like that,to get by.
The NetAgents have a,Japanese branch in,Eien Town.
My friends tell me that,Eien Town is lush and green.
The company hosting the,N1 League is the famous,Border Concern.
It’s only rivaled by Scarlet Inc.，,a company based in Engelles.
Thanks for going with me!,Today was fun!
The next time you’re needed,for questioning，I’ll go with you,again!
Well，bye bye!
I guess we should go home.
Ah，someone’s calling....,Well，if it isn’t Henchie!
Hey there!,What’d Medicine do this....
Mistress! This is bad!,That Navi，you-know-who!
Calm down! What’s wrong?
A NetAgent just came into,Dr. Morichika’s lab!
Y-Yorihime’s attacking!
Don’t tell me....!,Yamame was arrested!?
Sounds like it.,What’s that stubborn kid,thinking!?
To the lab!,We gotta go right now!
Let’s hurry，Shanghai!
Now，on to Eien Town!,Let’s go!
Alice，let’s go to Eien Town!
The N1 League is today.,I wonder who will come out,on top.
Huh!? You’re the N1 League,champ!? Wow!
I wonder if Kumami can,teach me how to NetBattle.
I’d love to watch the,N1 League，but I have to,work over break....
I’m going on a business trip to,Engelles soon. I don’t speak a,foreign language，but....
I’ll be fine since PETs come,with an automatic translation,program.
Really?,You’re going on a trip abroad?
Be sure to make lots of,memories!
The splendid Seiren cruise liner,is docked at the harbor right,now.
It seems like a lot of rich,celebrities ride it. I’d like to,ride it too someday.
When I was young，a war,broke out between Earth,and the space-dwelling
Colony Republic.,Back then，we sent many,spaceships into space.
They called it a spaceship，but,it was a ship that could fight in,space and also fly in the sky.
Isn’t it the best，coming home,after a trip?
I just got back from a trip，too....
I’m tired〜!
Back from your trip，Alice?
I heard there was an incident in,Engelles，were you alright?
Ah? You were there while it,happened? No wonder things,ended up okay!
Alice! Welcome back!
Tenshi，you’re out of the,hospital! I’m so glad!
I got you a souvenir!
Wow! What a beautiful bracelet!,I can’t accept this!
Call it a gift to celebrate getting,better!
Thank you very much!
(She bought it with my money，,though....)
Now that you’re done handing,out souvenirs，we should head,home to Mama.
Time to go home!
Thank you for the souvenir!,Take care!
Do you want to NetBattle before,you go?
Alice，you’re back!
Rika! We got souvenirs!
No way! A model of the next-,gen Engelles Army MBT!
This is amazing! Thank you so,much!
You’re welcome!
Now that you’re done handing,out souvenirs，we should head,home to Mama.
Time to go home!
This is the best gift!,I’m so happy!
Feel like a NetBattle?,TankMan was lonely while,Shanghai was gone!
It’s been pretty peaceful lately.,Not a peep out of ROM....
My Navi just got attacked!,What’s going on?!
I’m not going on the Net for a,while....
School’s out，so I’m playing,outside today.
My mama told me to stay off the,Net.
It feels weird to miss going to,school....
It must have been ROM behind,the attack....
Only a big criminal organization,would be able to hit the whole,Net at once.
Something big is happening on,the Net.
What are the NetAgents doing?
Something big is happening on,the Net.
What are the NetAgents doing?
It’s a Type-28 SDF land plane.
It looks out of place，especially,in your hometown.
It’s a Type-28 SDF land plane.
It looks out of place，especially,in your hometown.
It’s a Type-28 SDF land plane.
It looks out of place，especially,in your hometown.
I don’t know what ROM will do,next....
It’s scary，seeing the SDF,out there.
I know the NetAgents and the,SDF are hard at work to beat,ROM....
But I have a feeling you’ll be the,one to take them down，Alice!
I’ve been instructed to assist,the SDF in responding to,ROM’s declaration of war.
Every asset will be needed in,case this hits the real world like,the Internet Armageddon.
Just what has the world come,to....?
A man in a suit?
Perhaps you’re thinking of the,man who said he was going to,the park in Eien Town?
It’s the metro station，,but now’s not the time!
It seems wrong to ignore your,friends，especially since,they’ve been waiting for you.
Ride the metro to where?
Ride the metro to where?
Ride the metro to where?
We can’t go home yet!,We have to finish handing out,all our souvenirs!
It’s a garden security system.
A hidden camera is watching,our door from the flower bed.
Video is sent to a mobile,device so we can watch the,house while we’re away.
It has a jack in port for,maintenance.
It’s Mari’s house.,The door is locked.
It’s a small empty apartment.
It’s a small apartment. Looks,like someone’s moving in.
It’s Tenshi’s apartment.,The door is locked.
It’s a small empty apartment.
It’s a small apartment. Looks,like someone’s moving in.
It’s Tsubaki’s apartment.,The door is locked.
The sign says:,”Tenant Wanted”.
It’s been like this for as long,as I can remember.
It’s Remilia’s mansion.,The door is locked.
It’s Rika’s house.,The door is locked.
This park used to have,playground equipment，but,they removed it after children
kept hurting themselves on it.
I wonder what the bench was,thinking as the playground was,being torn down...
This park used to have,playground equipment，but,they removed it after children
kept hurting themselves on it.
I wonder what the bench was,thinking as the playground,was being torn down....
!!,There’s a jack in port,on the side!
Looks like it’s not just an,ordinary bench.
Challenge Rika to a NetBattle?
TankMan! Go!
A win for Rika!
You’re too strong，Alice!
Shanghai! I’m going to show,you something cool!
Let’s fight! TankMan!
A win for Rika!
I’m sorry，TankMan....
I’ll show you my true strength!
Time to get serious!
How’s that，Shanghai?! Did you,fall in love with my strength?
Drat! I just can’t win!
Next time，then!
Challenge Tenshi to a,NetBattle?
Iku!,Do your best!
Yay! I won!
Alice，you’re so strong!
Miss Tenshi has customized,me to be even more powerful!
I won’t lose anymore!
You did it，Iku!
Amazing，Alice!,You’ll have to show me how,you customize next time!
Whenever you feel like it!
Maybe ”where rest is born”,refers to the park and ”dry,earth” refers the sandbox?
But was this a park when,our client’s ancestors were,around?
There’s no way to know,unless we dig，right?
Wha!?,I have to dig through,the sandbox!?
”Dry earth” must mean the,sandbox，so ”beneath” means,it’s underground.
You’re the only one who can,dig，so just remember that,you’re helping someone!
That’s....
Pant.... Pant....
It’s sand. It shouldn’t be,that hard to dig through.
Keep going!,Don’t give up now!
Haaah〜!
There’s a small box!
Bingo!,Let’s dig it out and fill up,the hole!
Whaaaaaaa!?,Fill it up!?
Hah.... No more....,I never want to see a,sand scoop again....
Nice work!,Now，what’s in the box!?
....What’s this?
It’s a really old data chip....
Let’s try running it.
....Kyaa!,It was full of viruses!
You idiot!!
Ancient viruses....,They sure were terrifying.
So，what kind of data is this....?
....I have no idea.
Anyways，let’s bring it back,to our client!
You found me!
”99548214”! It’s a secret!
Everyone!,You came!
How could we miss the savior,of the world being released,from the hospital?
I was worried when I heard,that Alice took some serious,injuries! I was!
While we were in Perfect,Synchro，all the wounds I took,were reflected to Alice....
Back then，we didn't have,much of a choice....
Everyone’s okay now though!
Really，your resilience is,remarkable.
Big Sis is the best!
My body’s a bit sore，too....
This peace was won through,everybody’s hard work.
Mama is fine as long as Alice,is safe....
But they really are your,daughters，doing something,so rash.
I’m not that bad!,And I haven’t done anything,that dangerous.... recently.
....Wait. Blondie was Troid’s,daughter?!
You know him?
Well，that’s because Troid is,a famous adventurer.
Really!,A celebrity lived here this,whole time!
Don’t be shy，Reisen.,You should at least say hi.
Excuse me!,I’d like to get an exclusive,interview，if you don’t mind.
Oh no!,Even though we just got the,flowerbed system fixed!
Maybe some nasty viruses,got in?
Alice，I know we’re supposed,to be taking it easy，but we,can handle this， can’t we?
Yeah! Of course!
Jack In!,Shanghai.EXE!,Execute!
Oh，hey there Alice!
I guess I’m proud to live right,next to the person who saved,the world!
One month until summer break!,I’m glad that it’s so peaceful,just in time for vacation!
I don’t know why，but it feels,like the world’s calmed down,all of a sudden.
